entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
